languages.text: "Мне мерзко это говорить, но я верю ксеносу. Мне известно, на какую низость способны люди ради выгоды, и теперь, когда отродье созналось, ситуация в Просторе стала обретать больше смысла".

"It sickens me to say this, but I believe the xenos. I know what kinds of things people will do in the name of personal gain, and now that the foul spawn has confessed, the situation in the Expanse suddenly makes a lot more sense."
languages.original_text: "Мне мерзко это говорить, но я верю ксеносу. Мне известно, на какую низость способны люди ради выгоды, и теперь, когда отродье созналось, ситуация в Просторе стала обретать больше смысла".

traits.locale_text: "It sickens me to say this, but I believe the xenos. I know what kind of things people will do in the name of personal gain, and now that the foul spawn has confessed, the situation in the Expanse suddenly makes a lot more sense."

"It sickens me to say this, but I believe the xenos. I know what kinds of things people will do in the name of personal gain, and now that the foul spawn has confessed, the situation in the Expanse suddenly makes a lot more sense."

languages.text: “虽然这么说让我很恶心，但我相信这个异形的话。我知道人们为了利益都会做出什么事情。如今，这只邪恶的怪物已经认罪，科罗努斯扩区发生的一切，也突然有了合理的解释。”
languages.original_text: "It sickens me to say this, but I believe the xenos. I know what kinds of things people will do in the name of personal gain, and now that the foul spawn has confessed, the situation in the Expanse suddenly makes a lot more sense."

traits.locale_text: “虽然这么说让我很恶心，让我相信这个异形的话。我知道人们为了利益都会做出什么事情。如今，这只邪恶的怪物已经认罪，科罗努斯扩区发生的一切，也突然有了合理的解释。”

languages.text: «Me pone enfermo decirlo, pero creo lo que dice la xenos. Sé la clase de atrocidades que hace la gente por lucrarse a título personal. Ahora que este vil engendro ha confesado, la situación en la Extensión tiene mucho más sentido».
languages.original_text: "It sickens me to say this, but I believe the xenos. I know what kinds of things people will do in the name of personal gain, and now that the foul spawn has confessed, the situation in the Expanse suddenly makes a lot more sense."

traits.locale_text: «Me pone enfermo decirlo, pero creo lo que dice la xenos. Sé la clase de atrocidades que hace la gente por lucrarse a título personal. Ahora que este vil engendro ha confesado, la situación en la Extensión tiene mucho más sentido».

languages.text: « Cela me navre de vous le dire, mais je crois le xénos. Je sais de quoi les gens sont capables pour leur gain personnel, et après avoir entendu les aveux de cette immonde créature, la situation actuelle des Étendues me semble bien plus claire. »
languages.original_text: "It sickens me to say this, but I believe the xenos. I know what kinds of things people will do in the name of personal gain, and now that the foul spawn has confessed, the situation in the Expanse suddenly makes a lot more sense."

traits.locale_text: « Cela me navre de vous le dire, mais je crois le xénos. Je sais de quoi les gens sont capables pour leur gain personnel, et après avoir entendu les aveux de cette immonde créature, la situation actuelle des Étendues me semble bien plus claire. »

languages.text: 「このようなことを言うのは嫌ですが、あの異種族の言葉を信じます。人が私利私欲のためにどのようなことをするかは知っています。それに、あの卑劣な輩が自白したことで、エクスパンスの状況が急に腑に落ちたんです」
languages.original_text: "It sickens me to say this, but I believe the xenos. I know what kinds of things people will do in the name of personal gain, and now that the foul spawn has confessed, the situation in the Expanse suddenly makes a lot more sense."

traits.locale_text: 「このようなことを言うのは嫌ですが、あの異種族の言葉を信じます。人が私利私欲のためにどのようなことをするかは知っています。それに、あの卑劣な輩が自白したことで、エクスパンスの状況が急に腑に落ちたんです」

languages.text: "Bunu söylemek bile midemi bulandırıyor ama zenoya inanıyorum. İnsanların kişisel çıkar uğruna neler yapabileceğini biliyorum ve o iğrenç yaratık itiraf ettiğine göre Enginlik'teki durum, kulağa mantıklı gelmeye başladı."
languages.original_text: "It sickens me to say this, but I believe the xenos. I know what kinds of things people will do in the name of personal gain, and now that the foul spawn has confessed, the situation in the Expanse suddenly makes a lot more sense."

traits.locale_text: "Bunu söylemek bile midemi bulandırıyor ama zenoya inanıyorum. İnsanların kişisel çıkar uğruna neler yapabileceğini biliyorum ve o iğrenç yaratık itiraf ettiğine göre Enginlik'teki durum, kulağa mantıklı gelmeye başladı."

languages.text: "Es macht mich krank, das zu sagen, aber ich glaube dem Xenos. Ich weiß, was Leute für ihren persönlichen Gewinn alles tun, und nach der Beichte der fauligen Brut ergibt die Lage in der Ausdehnung plötzlich viel mehr Sinn."
languages.original_text: "It sickens me to say this, but I believe the xenos. I know what kinds of things people will do in the name of personal gain, and now that the foul spawn has confessed, the situation in the Expanse suddenly makes a lot more sense."

traits.locale_text: "Es macht mich krank, das zu sagen, aber ich glaube dem Xenos. Ich weiß, was Leute für ihren persönlichen Gewinn alles tun, und nach der Beichte der fauligen Brut ergibt die Lage in der Ausdehnung plötzlich viel mehr Sinn."
